title: X Factor: Celebrity's first look at Olivia Olson's comeback
text:
To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video

Olivia Olson has made her comeback 16 years after appearing in Love Actually.

The star is fancying her chances at winning a record deal with Simon Cowell, and has entered his celebrity version of The X Factor.

And while we were first introduced to her voice when she sang Mariah Carey’s All I Want For Christmas Is You, we’re about to get our next installment of Olson in tonight’s episode.

Ahead of her performance, the actress told fans what to expect in some swish slow-mo VT.

Advertisement

Advertisement

‘I’m ready for everyone to see Olivia Olson and hear me sing,’ the 27-year-old explained: ‘I want to be an artist I want to win this thing.’

Olivia Olson made her onscreen comeback (Picture: Rex)

She then took to the stage in front of the judges, where Nicole Scherzinger asked the contestant to introduce herself.

‘Hi everyone, hi, I’m Olivia Olson,’ she beamed before adding: ‘I’m an actress and a writer.’

Not shying away from her past, the singer continued: ‘I have not been seen for a while I do a lot of voice-over work for cartoons.

‘But some of the Brits in the house might remember me from a little Richard Curtis movie called Love Actually.’

She starred in Love Actually (Picture: Universal Pictures)

She wants a Simon Cowell record deal (Picture: WireImage)

The Pussycat Dolls star asked Olivia how old she was when filming her performance on the movie.

Olivia confirmed: ’10 when we filmed it.’

Looking impressed, the popstar added: ‘You were unbelievable then, so I have no idea what you’re going to do today.’

The star smiled: ‘I’m nervous but this is a great opportunity so I’m gonna do it.’

Olivia will join the likes of Megan McKenna, who will be singing one of her own original hits, making her the current bookies’ favourite.

Advertisement

Advertisement

The X Factor: Celebrity continues tonight on ITV.

description: X Factor: Celebrity's first look at Olivia Olson's comeback 16 years after Love Actually.
